title: The Vicious Cycle of Pursuing Perfection
alt: A spiral staircase shot from above, symbolizing going in circles
description: Reflecting on how the pursuit of perfection can trap us in endless cycles of self-doubt and unfinished work, and learning to embrace imperfection.

title: The Lack of Human Interactions on Me
alt: A single chair in an empty room, evoking loneliness and absence
description: Exploring the impact of solitude and the longing for meaningful connections in a world that often feels distant.
